README:
This Cucumber environment is bundled with:
- PicoContainer DI framework
- JMock2
- Mockito
Hiker.feature:
Feature: full text keyword translate

Scenario Outline: user input words
When user input <keywords> with exactly <flag>
Then the translation output will be <output>
Examples:
|keywords| flag  | output  |
| word   | false |  word*  |
| *word* | false |  *word* |
cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
